Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Prohibits the sale of certain medical solution containers
Summary: Prohibits the sale of certain medical solution containers containing PVC, DEHP or unintentionally added DEHP.
LawCode: Add Art 37 Title 8 §§37-0801 & 37-0803, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of medical solution containers made with PVC, intentionally added DEHP, and establishes acceptable limits for unintentionally added DEHP
